description: This file implements utility functions for managing Avahi-based service discovery and advertisement, including creating and destroying clients, starting/stopping polling, registering services and browsers, and handling related callbacks. It is part of a namespace structure indicating integration within a certain framework or plugin system.

classes.name: AvahiUtils
classes.description: A helper class to manage Avahi service discovery, registration, and resolving functionalities, encapsulating the creation and control of Avahi clients, service groups, browsers, and associated callbacks within the framework.

methods.name: AvahiUtils()
methods.description: Constructor initializing internal members and creating an Avahi client.

methods.name: ~AvahiUtils()
methods.description: Destructor cleaning up by stopping and destroying the Avahi client and related resources.

methods.name: void createAvahiClient()
methods.description: Initialize the Avahi threaded poll and client objects.

methods.name: bool startAvahiClient()
methods.description: Start the Avahi threaded poll loop.

methods.name: void stopAvahiClient(bool internal)
methods.description: Stop the Avahi threaded poll loop, optionally internally.

methods.name: void destroyAvahiClient()
methods.description: Cleanup and deallocate Avahi client and poll objects.

methods.name: boost::optional<AvahiIfIndex> getIfIndex(const NetworkInterface & interface)
methods.description: Retrieve the interface index for specific network interfaces, e.g., USB.

methods.name: bool registerAvahiService(std::string name,std::string type,uint16_t port,const AvahiIfIndex & ifIndex)
methods.description: Register an Avahi network service with the given name, type, port, and interface index.

methods.name: bool addAvahiService(std::string name,std::string type,uint16_t port,const AvahiIfIndex & ifIndex)
methods.description: Add a service to the Avahi entry group, preparing it for registration.

methods.name: bool commitAvahiGroup()
methods.description: Commit the current Avahi entry group to publish the service.

methods.name: bool registerAvahiBrowser(std::string type,IAvahiBrowserListener * listener,const AvahiIfIndex & ifIndex)
methods.description: Create a service browser for discovering services of a particular type.

methods.name: void browseCallback(AvahiServiceBrowser * browser,AvahiIfIndex interface,AvahiProtocol protocol,AvahiBrowserEvent event,const char * name,const char * type,const char * domain,AVAHI_GCC_UNUSED AvahiLookupResultFlags flags,void * userData)
void clientCallback(AvahiClient * client,AvahiClientState state,AVAHI_GCC_UNUSED void * userData)
void groupCallback(AvahiEntryGroup * group,AvahiEntryGroupState state,AVAHI_GCC_UNUSED void * userData)

void resolveCallback(AvahiServiceResolver * resolver,AVAHI_GCC_UNUSED AvahiIfIndex interface,AVAHI_GCC_UNUSED AvahiProtocol protocol,AvahiResolverEvent event,const char * name,const char * type,const char * domain,const char * hostName,const AvahiAddress * address,uint16_t port,AvahiStringList * txt,AvahiLookupResultFlags flags,AVAHI_GCC_UNUSED void * userData)

ctags.name: addAvahiService
ctags.pattern: /^bool AvahiUtils::addAvahiService(std::string name, std::string type, uint16_t port, const AvahiI/

ctags.name: browseCallback
ctags.signature: (AvahiServiceBrowser * browser,AvahiIfIndex interface,AvahiProtocol protocol,AvahiBrowserEvent event,const char * name,const char * type,const char * domain,AVAHI_GCC_UNUSED AvahiLookupResultFlags flags,void * userData)

ctags.name: clientCallback
ctags.pattern: /^void AvahiUtils::clientCallback(AvahiClient* client, AvahiClientState state, AVAHI_GCC_UNUSED vo/

ctags.name: registerAvahiService
ctags.pattern: /^bool AvahiUtils::registerAvahiService(std::string name, std::string type, uint16_t port, const A/

ctags.name: resolveCallback
ctags.signature: (AvahiServiceResolver * resolver,AVAHI_GCC_UNUSED AvahiIfIndex interface,AVAHI_GCC_UNUSED AvahiProtocol protocol,AvahiResolverEvent event,const char * name,const char * type,const char * domain,const char * hostName,const AvahiAddress * address,uint16_t port,AvahiStringList * txt,AvahiLookupResultFlags flags,AVAHI_GCC_UNUSED void * userData)
